title: Dungeon ni Deai wo Motomeru no wa Machigatteiru Darou ka II OVA

alternative_titles.en: Is It Wrong to Try to Pick Up Girls in a Dungeon? II: Is It Wrong to go Searching for Herbs on a Deserted Island?
alternative_titles.ja: ダンジョンに出会いを求めるのは間違っているだろうか 2期 OVA

synopsis:
Miach sends the Hestia Familia to find a rare herb on a deserted island. Unbeknownst to the group, a familiar face is also on the island and things will get chaotic.

(Source: DanMachi Wiki)
